channel.title: How do i change players stats?
channel.description:
Well, i have got Phonescape's source, edited it abit, made myself a admin, added a few new features etc.
Now, is their a way to change my player stats? Theirs a characters folder, and when i change stats & xp in there to 99, it doesn't work when i login. Can anybody help me? Thanks :P

item.title: How do i change players stats?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You have to be logged out while you do the change, because every time you log out it saves your current stats.

Do you understand what I just wrote, and my explanation of it?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change players stats?

item.source: How do i change players stats?

item.title: How do i change players stats?
item.dc:creator: @lewisc66 lewisc66
item.description:
@lewisc66 wrote:

To change player stats you need to go into your moparscape folder…And then go into where it says Hybridscape then go into characters then go onto a player who has made a acount on your server then it says when you click on there folder…scroll down and it says SKILLS then change all of the -1 to 99.And then save the file when you have done that.When they logg on again there levels should be 99 and they should be lvl 126. Thank you Lewisc66

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change players stats?
item.dc:creator: @Baros_Rocks Baros Rocks
item.description:
@Baros_Rocks wrote:

Im gonna try and explain this to you.

Replace this:


[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0	73	497400
character-skill = 1	60	144750
character-skill = 2	60	144750
character-skill = 3	70	16101200
character-skill = 4	1	0
character-skill = 5	1	0
character-skill = 6	84	1592880
character-skill = 7	1	0
character-skill = 8	1	0
character-skill = 9	1	0
character-skill = 10	1	0
character-skill = 11	1	0
character-skill = 12	1	0
character-skill = 13	1	0
character-skill = 14	1	0
character-skill = 15	1	0
character-skill = 16	1	0
character-skill = 17	1	0
character-skill = 18	80	1025100
character-skill = 19	1	0
character-skill = 20	1	0
character-skill = 21	1	0
character-skill = 22	1	0
character-skill = 23	1	0
character-skill = 24	1	0

With this:

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0	135	1400000000
character-skill = 1	135	1400000000
character-skill = 2	135	1400000000
character-skill = 3	135	1400000000
character-skill = 4	135	1400000000
character-skill = 5	135	1400000000
character-skill = 6	135	1400000000
character-skill = 7	135	1400000000
character-skill = 8	135	1400000000
character-skill = 9	135	1400000000
character-skill = 10	135	1400000000
character-skill = 11	135	1400000000
character-skill = 12	135	1400000000
character-skill = 13	135	1400000000
character-skill = 14	135	1400000000
character-skill = 15	135	1400000000
character-skill = 16	135	1400000000
character-skill = 17	135	1400000000
character-skill = 18	135	1400000000
character-skill = 19	135	1400000000
character-skill = 20	135	1400000000
character-skill = 21	135	1400000000
character-skill = 22	135	1400000000
character-skill = 23	135	1400000000
character-skill = 24	135	1400000000

When you changed it to 99 it probably didn’t work as you left the xp the same. Then as you log in the level changes to what the xp says it should be.
